EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Follow Up (1330373668.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Follow Up (1330373668.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Lenard, I received your information from Emily Dyche and wanted to take a moment to reach out and introduce myself. She mentioned that while you will not be working through Booz Allen at this time, that you may be interested in utilizing our services for other consulting opportunities and wanted some additional information about our program. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK">going here. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
